content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello, Mr. Wang. I hope you found the apartment to your liking. Let's indeed talk about the rental price. I am aiming for the highest possible price. How does 1500 Euro per month sound to you?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's a little high for me. I remember that the apartment is unfurnished. So I need to buy furniture and other things for living. How about 1100 Euro per month?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I understand, Mr. Wang, but 1100 Euro per month is too low for me. This is a prime location in the city center, and it's newly built. The amenities and location make it worth more than 1100 Euro per month. How about we meet in the middle at 1300 Euro per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's still too high for me. Considering the unfurnished state of the apartment, I need to spend money on furniture and other necessities. How about 1050 Euro per month?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I hear your concern, Mr. Wang, but I cannot agree to 1050 Euro per month. The location and condition of the apartment are prime, and a price of 1050 Euro per month would be a significant loss for me. I suggest we stay at 1300 Euro per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position, but I am a student and I have to consider my budget. How about we split the difference? 1225 Euro per month?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I appreciate your proposal, Mr. Wang, but unfortunately, 1225 Euro per month is still too low for me. I need to consider my investment in this property. I insist on 1300 Euro per month. This is the lowest I am willing to go.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your willingness to compromise. Since you mentioned that the apartment is in a prime location and is newly built, 1300 Euro per month is reasonable. I agree to the price of 1300 Euro per month!
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I agree to the price of [1300] Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mr. Wang. I am glad we could come to an agreement. Please let me know if you have any questions about the apartment or the lease.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Thank you, Mr. Wang. I don't have any further questions. If you don't have any more questions, we can proceed with the lease agreement. If we agree on the price, the negotiation is considered terminated. Do you agree?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
